data.description:
A VR drum kit simulator 2 years into development.

Now thanks to the creation of VR you can own your very own full sized drum kit, with all the goodies, at a fraction of the cost of the real thing. 

You can play it loud or put your headphones on so only you can hear it. Play, practice or learn drumming in VR. 

Perform drum covers to your favorite music with the in-game file browser and .MP3/.OGG audio player. Play your own music files directly within your Quest headset. (Storage/SD card)

Try different styles of drumming. Take a break from the drum kit and stand, strap on the tenor drum harness, an unique style of drumming and hardware popular in marching bands or sporting events.

- Cast or record videos of your drumming with Quest built-in video record.
- Bring a full drum kit anywhere, just bring your Quest.
- Pressure sensitive hits.
- Bass and hi-hat foot pedals. (Controllers or USB pedal hardware/gamepads)
- Multiple stages or locations to drum. You choose.
- Save your drum kit layout and return to it next time.
- Change the sound of each drum.
- Play your music in-game .MP3 .OGG audio files.
- Customizable audio settings and in-game options, position drums, modify the look and sound.

Multiple hi-hats, bass drums, toms, snares, splash and crash, china cymbals, cowbells, steelpan and more. Live the ultimate drumming fantasy.

Extra
- Liv.tv (test)
- More features are being added

VRDUS has been tested by multiple players and drummers from other VR drum applications with good input.
